chapters.title: Chapter 23: Ornaments
chapters.info: Elza Penfell, p. 538 (650)—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She is one of the Aes Sedai now sworn Rand; she assisted in his kidnapping. She is now one of Cadsuane's companions. She is secretly of the Black Ajah, but almost no one knows this. See also Fearil.
